languages.text: На короткое время на мире воцарились идеалы равенства — среди спасенных почти не было аристократов, привычных к правлению чернью. Но уже спустя поколение все вернулось к нормальному порядку — вчерашние серфы с удовольствием приняли бремя власти и прилагающиеся к нему права помыкать теми, кто ниже.

For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.
languages.original_text: На короткое время на мире воцарились идеалы равенства — среди спасенных почти не было аристократов, привычных к правлению чернью. Но уже спустя поколение все вернулось к нормальному порядку — вчерашние серфы с удовольствием приняли бремя власти и прилагающиеся к нему права помыкать теми, кто ниже.

traits.locale_text: For a short time, the world became a realm of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats accustomed to commanding the serfs among the saved. But a generation later everything returned to normal — yesterday's serfs took the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those who are of lower rank, that comes along with it.

For a short time, the world became a realm of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats accustomed to commanding the serfs among the saved. But a generation later everything returned to normal — yesterday's serfs took the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those who are of lower rank, that comes along with it.

For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But a generation later everything returned to normal — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But a generation later everything returned to normal — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

languages.text: 由于幸存者之中几乎没有贵族，殖民地中也没有任何等级制度，这个世界短暂地实现了平等。但是，仅仅过了一代人之后，一切又回到了老样子。昨日的农奴开开心心地接过了权力的重负，顺带继承了虐待底层人的特权。
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: 由于幸存者之中几乎没有贵族，殖民地中也没有任何等级制度，这个世界短暂地实现了平等。但是，仅仅过了一代人之后，一切又回到了老样子。昨日的农奴开开心心地接过了权力的重负，顺带继承了虐待底层人的特权。

languages.text: Für kurze Zeit herrschte in der Welt Gleichheit, denn es gab kaum noch Aristokraten, die irgendeine Hierarchie hätten durchsetzen können. Doch eine Generation später war schon wieder alles beim Alten. Die Sklaven von gestern übernahmen mit Vergnügen die Last der Autorität sowie das Recht, alle von niederem Rang zu unterdrücken und zu misshandeln.
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: Für kurze Zeit herrschte in der Welt Gleichheit, denn es gab kaum noch Aristokraten, die irgendeine Hierarchie hätten durchsetzen können. Doch eine Generation später war schon wieder alles beim Alten. Die Sklaven von gestern übernahmen mit Vergnügen die Last der Autorität sowie das Recht, alle von niederem Rang zu unterdrücken und zu misshandeln.

languages.text: Durant quelque temps, l'absence des aristocrates, chargés d'ordinaire de faire respecter les diverses hiérarchies, permit au monde de connaître une période où régnait enfin l'égalité. Cependant, les choses revinrent à la normale à peine une génération plus tard : les serfs d'autrefois acceptèrent le fardeau de l'autorité avec plaisir, en profitant pour exploiter les plus modestes.
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: Durant quelque temps, l'absence des aristocrates, chargés d'ordinaire de faire respecter les diverses hiérarchies, permit au monde de connaître une période où régnait enfin l'égalité. Cependant, les choses revinrent à la normale à peine une génération plus tard : les serfs d'autrefois acceptèrent le fardeau de l'autorité avec plaisir, en profitant pour exploiter les plus modestes.

languages.text: Durante un tiempo, el mundo fue un lugar igualitario, prácticamente libre de aristócratas capaces de ejercer su jerarquía. En una generación, todo volvió a la normalidad: los sirvientes del pasado aceptaron el peso de la autoridad con gusto, al igual que el derecho a maltratar a las castas inferiores.
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: Durante un tiempo, el mundo fue un lugar igualitario, prácticamente libre de aristócratas capaces de ejercer su jerarquía. Una generación más tarde, todo volvió a la normalidad: los sirvientes del pasado aceptaron el peso de la autoridad con gusto, al igual que el derecho a maltratar a las castas inferiores.

languages.text: 世界は束の間、平等な場所になった。何らかの階級を強いる貴族が、ほとんど姿を消したのだ。ただし、次の世代ではすべてが通常通りに戻った。昨日までの労奴たちが、権威の重みや低身分者を弄ぶ権利をすすんで引き受けたのだ。
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: 世界は束の間、平等な場所になった。何らかの階級を強いる貴族が、ほとんど姿を消したのだ。ただし、次の世代ではすべてが元に戻った。昨日までの労奴たちが、権威の重みや低身分者を弄ぶ権利をすすんで引き受けたのだ。

languages.text: Kısa bir dönem boyunca dünyaya eşitlik hâkim oldu. Herhangi bir hiyerarşiyi dayatacak kadar çok aristokrat yoktu. Ancak bir nesil sonra her şey eski hâline döndü. Dünün köleleri, otoritenin yükünü üstlenip daha alt seviye olanlara kötü davranma hakkını zevkle eline aldı.
languages.original_text: For a short time, the world was a place of equality, as there were almost no aristocrats left to enforce any kind of hierarchy. But within a generation everything had returned to business as usual — yesterday's serfs assumed the burdens of authority with pleasure, as well as the right to mistreat those of lower rank.

traits.locale_text: Kısa bir dönem boyunca dünyaya eşitlik hâkim oldu. Herhangi tip bir hiyerarşiyi uygulamaya sokacak kadar çok aristokrat yoktu. Ancak bir nesil sonra her şey yine eski hâline döndü. Dünün köleleri, otoritenin yükünü de, daha düşük seviye olanlara kötü davranma hakkını da zevkle üstlendi.
